attributes.description:
The 2011 Land Rover Freelander 2 SD4 HSE features a pleasantly styled and highly functional cabin design, amazing family vehicle with loads of space inside. It comes with power steering, multi-functioning steering, electric windows, central locking remote, front electric seats, electric mirrors, air conditioning, radio/CD/AUX input, navigation system, front armrest and glass sunroof. Your loyalty and support as our current and future client are highly appreciated. Thank you for choosing Crescent Car Sales. Giving you excellent service is always a pleasure. We are privileged to help you own what you love. We guarantee 100% satisfaction on all products and services from us. Our price excludes additional costs such as license and registration, COR. The mechanical warranty is optional.
The vehicle has been reduced from 169 995 to 149 995.
#10229
attributes.title: 2011 Land Rover Freelander II 2.2 SD4 HSE Auto

attributes.description:
The E90 3 series is the fifth generation BMW 3 series sedan which has great styling, comfort and reliability. This particular vehicle is an individual spec. This means with the help of the BMW Individual program, a variety of models from the BMW lineup are customized with a wider selection of color and trim options. The results are a BMW that is unique and stands out from the crowd. It is a stunning Rubin Black colour with two tone black and white leather interior. It is also loaded with ABS, Airbags, Aircon, Electric windows, Electric mirrors, Power steering, Cruise control, Multi-functional steering wheel, Start button, 6 Speed manual transmission, Climate control, BMW rubber mats, Front loader radio with AUX input and a set of 18" Alloy wheels. 

 For more information, contact 0835091700 or 0728242534
attributes.title: 2006 BMW 3 Series 323i Individual
